title: Text Summarizer
description: Quickly distill long articles, reports, or documents into concise summaries. Great for saving time on research.

title: Code Generator
description: Generate boilerplates, snippets, or entire functions in various programming languages based on your prompts.

title: Recipe Converter
description: Adjust ingredient quantities for different serving sizes, or convert between metric and imperial measurements.

title: Color Palette Mixer
description: Experiment with different color schemes and generate accessible palettes for web development projects.
